level.text: A title insurance producer shall fulfill the following continuing education requirements:
Eight hours per year, of which not more than 4 hours may be completed by computer or video-based education; or
If the title insurance producer is an attorney, 4 hours per year in courses related to real estate and continuing education courses approved by the Commissioner by rule.
The Commissioner may establish continuing education requirements for resident insurance producers.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 18-223 rewrote the section, which had read as follows:
"The Commissioner may establish continuing education requirements for resident insurance producers."

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2166(d) of Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-463, July 2, 2010, 57 DCR 6542).
